title: Classic French Crepes
directions: Add the ingredients into the blender. Add the flour last. Blend for a few seconds until you have a smooth batter. You can use a stick blender as well for this purpose.
Cover the batter and let it rest for at least 20 minutes. The batter can be kept in the fridge overnight as well.
ingredients: 2 tsp sugar for savory crepes, OR
2 - 3 tbsp sugar for sweet dessert crepes
4 oz all purpose flour scant 1 cup
